title: Green Bean Casserole
steps: Blanch green beans in salted water 4 minutes. Ice bath. Drain well.
Melt butter. Cook mushrooms until browned, 8 minutes. Season.
Add flour, cook 1 minute. Whisk in broth and cream.
Simmer until thickened, 5 minutes. Add soy sauce.
Combine beans and sauce in 9x13 dish.
Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes. Add remaining onions. Bake 5 more minutes.
notes: Fresh beans are so much better than canned.
Adding onions at end keeps them crispy.
